children.text: There are obvious ommisions/defects in this area that may cause the structure to potentially fail/collapse, which could have devastating effect on not only the structure, but to the safety of workers and site visitors.

There are OH&S laws in Victoria (The Occupational Health & Safety Regulations) that require the builder to ensure that the site is safe for all workers and/or visitors, and apart from the obvious need for the builder to rectify this immediately, they risk huge fines from Worksafe Victoria until these areas are made safe.
Additionally, the possible delays and cost ramifications for what would be a simple rectification now seems difficult to overlook.
The builder should immediately take steps to rectify and make safe this area.
